item.title: Covid19 data exploration
item.description: COVID-19-Analysis Phase of Exponential Growth in Europe Getting Data The article is an exploration of COVID-19 data. The data is provided by the Johns Hopkins University, Center for Systems Science and Engineering (JHU CSSE). A Github repository that contains daily updated data of confirmed incidence cases cases of death and recovered cases is available at https://github.com/CSSEGISandData/COVID-19, Required Libraries library(dplyr) library(tidyverse) library(ggplot2) library(lubridate) Download Data #URLS github<-"https://raw.
